Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.properties.glossaries

package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.properties.glossaries
Beans for managing glossaries and their contents.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.properties
    These beans describe the core properties that are passed to the server to create and update metadata.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractConceptProperties
    AbstractConceptProperties is used to provide the properties for an AbstractConcept classification.
    ActivityDescriptionProperties
    ActivityDescriptionProperties is used to classify a glossary that describes an activity.
    AntonymProperties
    AntonymProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    CanonicalVocabularyProperties
    CanonicalVocabularyProperties is used to classify a glossary that has no term definitions with the same name.
    ContextDefinitionProperties
    ContextDefinitionProperties describes a type of context that a glossary term represents.
    DataValueProperties
    DataValueProperties is used to provide the properties for a DataValue classification.
    ElementSupplementProperties
    ClassificationBeanProperties is used to provide the properties for a ElementSupplement classification.
    GlossaryProperties
    GlossaryProperties is a class for representing a generic glossary.
    GlossaryTermProperties
    GlossaryTermProperties contains the semantic definition (meaning) of a word or phrase (term - collectively called terminology).
    GlossaryTermRelationshipProperties
    GlossaryTermRelationshipProperties describes a type of relationship between two glossary terms in a glossary.
    ISARelationshipProperties
    ISARelationshipProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    PreferredTermProperties
    PreferredTermProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    RelatedTermProperties
    RelatedTermProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    ReplacementTermProperties
    ReplacementTermProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    SynonymProperties
    SynonymProperties describes a relationship between two glossary terms.
    TaxonomyProperties
    TaxonomyProperties is used to classify a glossary that has the terms organized in a taxonomy.
    UsedInContextProperties
    UsedInContextProperties describes a relationship between a glossary term and its context.
